explains: n. 扩音器，喇叭；<旧>（收音机或乐器的）扬声器，喇叭

sentences.en: One boy did an imitation of a soldier with a loudspeaker.
sentences.cn: 一个男孩拿着扬声器学着士兵的样子。

sentences.en: I distinctly heard the loudspeaker calling passengers for the Washington-Miami flight.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地听到扩音器在呼叫由华盛顿飞往迈阿密的旅客。

sentences.en: It makes one think of the story about the airline pilot who told his passengers over the loudspeaker.
sentences.cn: 这让人想起了那个飞行员通过扩音器告诉乘客的故事。
